skill.description: Provide founded feedback through both criticism and praise in a respectful, clear, and consistent manner. Highlight achievements as well as mistakes and set up methods of formative assessment to evaluate work.
skill.alt_labels: propose constructive feedback;offer constructive feedback;gives constructive feedback;provide constructive feedback;giving constructive feedback

skill.title: digital compositing
skill.description: The process and software for digitally assembling multiple images to make one, final image.
